Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga took 3 for 21 in the middle overs
Babar Azam scored 30 off 28 balls but was run out
Pathum Nissanka hit an unbeaten 55 off 48 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's victory was a crucial moment in their playoff push
Hasaranga's performance was highly praised as a first big performance of the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's tight bowling in the powerplay
Pakistan's last nine wickets fell for 58 runs
Sri Lanka won by five wickets with 18 balls remaining
